content: Captain Kalpa-Wave is one of the four captains you can find in Chapter 3, and is one of two that are required to defeat to progress the story.

The content is as follows:
Captain Kalpa-Wave is one of the four captains you can find in Chapter 3, and is one of two that are required to defeat to progress the story.
